dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: Good afternoon! How can I assist you today?
dialogue.arabic: مرحبا بك في متجرنا! كيف يمكنني مساعدتك اليوم؟

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Hi! I'm looking for a formal dress for an event.
dialogue.arabic: مرحبا! أبحث عن فستان رسمي لحدث مهم.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: Sure, we have a wide selection. What color and size are you looking for?
dialogue.arabic: بالطبع لدينا تشكيلة واسعة. أي لون ومقاس تبحثين عنه؟

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: I prefer a navy blue dress in size medium.
dialogue.arabic: أفضل فستانًا أزرق داكن بمقاس متوسط.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: Excellent choice! Let me show you our selection.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Thank you. I'm also looking for a pair of black heels to go with it.
dialogue.arabic: شكرا لك. أنا أبحث أيضا عن حذاء كعب عالي أسود ليتناسب معه.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: Certainly! We have a lovely collection of heels. What size do you wear?
dialogue.arabic: بالطبع! لدينا مجموعة رائعة من الكعب العالي. ما هو مقاسك؟

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: I wear a size 7 in shoes.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: Great! Here are some options for you to try on.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Thank you so much. These look perfect!

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: You're welcome! Is there anything else you'd like to look at?
dialogue.arabic: العفو! هل هناك أي شيء آخر ترغبين في مشاهدته؟

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: I think I'm all set. How much do I owe you?
dialogue.arabic: أعتقد أنني جاهزة. كم أدين لك؟

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: Your total comes to $150 for the dress and $50 for the heels.
dialogue.arabic: مجموعك يبلغ 150 دولارا للفستان و 50 دولارا للحذاء de الكعب.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Here you go. Keep the change.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.english: Thank you! Enjoy your new outfit!
